# Class TextData

Text data for graph processing.

Handles text content with string manipulation capabilities.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy fromExternal

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new TextData(text?: string): [TextData]()

Creates a new TextData instance.

#### Parameters

    * `Optional`text: string = ''

Initial text content (defaults to empty string)

#### Returns [TextData]()

Overrides BaseData.constructor




## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this data.

#### Returns void

Inherited from BaseData.destroy




### `Static`fromExternal

  * fromExternal(external: any): [TextData]()

Creates a TextData instance from an external reference.

#### Parameters

    * external: any

External reference to text data

#### Returns [TextData]()

New TextData instance wrapping the external reference
